.. _`10_2_0_overview`:

Introduction
############

cs.workflow 10.2.0 is a comprehensive overhaul.


New Components and Functionality
================================

* Constraints
* Briefcases
* Information Messages
* System Tasks
* Workflow Designer


Removed Components and Functionality
====================================

* Ad Hoc Workflows (including the Ad Hoc Workflow Designer)
* Information Tasks
* Manual Task Groups
* Object Roles and Object Rules

The Workflow Engine itself has been updated, so any customizing in Powerscript
has to be reviewed, and possibly be adapted.
